text: Pokrovka () is a rural locality (a village) in Cherkassky Selsoviet, Ufimsky District, Bashkortostan, Russia. The population was 65 as of 2010. There are 5 streets. == Geography == It is located 43 km from Ufa, 8 km from Cherkassy. == References == Category:Rural localities in Ufimsky District
title: Pokrovka, Ufimsky District, Republic of Bashkortostan
